## Step 1: Determine the position of the fan of d&b
The fan of d&b is on the far left or far right (clue 11). Since the person who's hobby is magic-tricks is the fan of d&b (clue 7), we can conclude that the fan of d&b is at either position 1 or 7.


## Step 2: Determine the position of the musician
The musician is somewhere to the right of the designer (clue 4). The architect is on the right of the designer (clue 10), and the architect is between the person drinking hot-chocolate and the person drinking milk (clue 42). This means the designer, architect, and musician must be in positions 1-6, in that order.


## Step 3: Determine the position of the fan of funk
The fan of funk is in an odd position (clue 5), which means it can only be at positions 1, 3, 5, or 7. The person driving the bus is on the left of the fan of funk (clue 1), so the fan of funk cannot be at position 1.


## Step 4: Determine the position of the person watching western movies
The person watching western movies is somewhere to the left of the fan of salsa (clue 8). The fan of salsa is on the left of the person drinking iced-tea (clue 2), so we have a sequence: western, salsa, iced-tea.


## Step 5: Determine the position of the person driving the airplane
The person driving the airplane is in an odd position (clue 13) and is also the person watching western movies (clue 14). Since the person driving the airplane must be in an odd position, it can only be at positions 1, 3, 5, or 7.


## Step 6: Determine the position of the fan of disco
The person drinking water is somewhere to the right of the fan of disco (clue 20). This means the fan of disco must be on the left side of the table.


## Step 7: Analyze clues 15-49 and fill in the table accordingly
